content: this site has both knitting and crochet versions prayer shawls this page has instructions for three crochet prayer shawls - crocheted prayer shawl - double strand crocheted prayer shawl - tunisian crocheted prayer shawl **url seems to be having problems in the meantime the shawl pattern can be reached by visiting this archive of the page ** http //web archive org/web/20080112134604/http //www waitingroomministry com/newsite/shawls/crochet html
